website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet high-quality jug blender that's well made and comes at a reasonable price.
pros: The classic round pitcher holds 56 ounces and is made from durable, BPA-free polycarbonate
Extremely simple to operate with five speeds, plus an ice-crushing mode and a pulse feature
Soft start feature helps with even blending
cons: Some users report leaks from around the blade shaft

customer_reviews.title: Check these images before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it unless you get extended warranty with it. I bought this mashine last month and used it about 6 times and it got damaged. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Enlil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender, yet cleaning it is tricky & risky (see full review for details).
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. If a 4 1/2 star rating was allowed, that is what I would rate it because the blender isn't designed to remove the blade for thorough cleaning. The manufacturer wrote in their user manual to clean it with dish detergent and water, yet I usually need to use a sponge also to remove stuck food. Trying to clean near the blade area is tricky and risky because you could cut your finger if your sponge isn't long (large) enough to protect your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Robpluto

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than six weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered September 10, 2018. By October 25 it would not do anything. All lights flash when you try to run at any speed. Must be an electrical failure. Poor quality control if this can happen. We didn't abuse it by any means. Would love to have KitchenAid contact me about fixing or replacing with a good one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with KitchenAid products before, but this blender is of poor quality. I got the blender less than two weeks ago, and used it exactly six times afterwards. The cup was washed in the dishwasher before the first use. After that, I always hand washed and air dried immediately after each use. Today I found the screw top on top of the blade got rusted. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JP@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: It lasted less than 45 days before the pitcher started to leak. No damage to the pitcher or obvious reasons on why. Going to try and request a replacement and see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: WORSE THAN $20 MAGIC BULLET
customer_reviews.text: Worst product EVER!! I’ve never left a bad review on Amazon but for this crap blender I would give negative fiver stars if that was an option. I’ve had it for only a few weeks and used ONCE a day. First of all the blades kept getting stuck in the frozen fruit and couldn’t move until I stir the content - magic bullet works better than this!! And what’s even worse, the wheel at the bottom started to melt and finally just fell off completely after only a few use!!! Can’t believe I paid 80+ for this piece of garbage. Super disappointed. Returning it and never buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: ellelcx

customer_reviews.title: A lot of work
customer_reviews.text: The blender was delivered more than a month after order. The directions require unplugging every time before the cover is opened; failing this, a button could be brushed and accidentally put the contents on the ceiling. The small cap on top does not have a positive stop to lock it in place; user needs to feel where is seems a little harder to turn. The blades do not have a gentle start, even on lowest speed. Everything gets splashed to the top, where some of it may not trickle back into the mix. User needs to have a rubber spatula at hand to push the splashed contents down.
customer_reviews.author: Edward H. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.  Gave it away.
customer_reviews.text: This is the poorest designed product I have bought in a long time. The lid leaked every time I used the blender. It was also very difficult to lock the jar in place on the base. Looking at the design, it is just a pure interference fit, terrible. I gave it to charity and now feel guilty that someone may have taken it home.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, works great, has plastic pitcher that locks tightly onto motor
customer_reviews.text: I love my new blender. It works great, mixing well and crushing ice, making great margaritas and smoothies. I've used already crushed ice in it, and have found that it does leave some smaller chunks (still small enough to fit through a straw). It might crush better if I began with regular ice. I've used both the pulse options and the various other blending options, and all work beautifully. The pitcher is very stable on the blender motor, and there is no way anyone can shake it around (as some people are tempted to do). This is a very well-made product with a tight fitting lid, pourable spout, and plastic pitcher
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Willms

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive and well-designed unit with a powerful motor. It pulverized ice to as fine a consistency as one could want. The carafe is lightweight and easy to clean by hand or dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KYRetired

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice in a year - I won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have had two issues with this blender in about a year. First, the blades in the pitcher rusted extensively within a couple of months. I suspect there was a manufacturing issue with the coating or the metal itself. We did get this issue replaced under warranty, but were told at that time they would NOT fix anything again if it broke (I don't get that customer service??). So, of course, a few months later the mechanism that locks the pitcher in place failed, so now it "flops" around without locking and effectively renders the whole blender worthless. I will never buy this blender again, and probably not a Kitchen Aid based on the poor customer service experience I had.
customer_reviews.author: 21 king

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't seal - sprays everywhere when turned on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender to make soups and from day one the cheap plastic lid has been iffy about staying put, even when I hold it down. The "plug" on top has never set properly. It's gotten worse and worse - to the point where if I try to blend anything, I'm cleaning the floors, ceiling and walls and trying to save enough "blended" liquid to actually complete my cooking. KitchenAid used to be the best. I don't know what happened to them, but this blender is garbage. It's not worth $10, let alone $80. Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kooistra

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender but there is an issue of recurring ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender but there is an issue of recurring surface rust spots on the blades. This is the second blender that I've bought from KitchenAid and both have the same rust issue. I'm not entirely sure how safe it is to have rust on the blades that blend the product you're about to drink.
customer_reviews.author: MG45

customer_reviews.title: was great til it burned out
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a year and a half but now the motor is burnt out (daily use). I've heard Ninja stays in great condition with daily use, even after 2 years, so I'm going to replace this with a Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: DKLJJKAD

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect Blender
customer_reviews.text: Love, LOVE, LOVED this blender! Handy, lightweight, easy to clean; does exactly what I need it to do! Was hoping to replace the Ninja I hate with this Kitchen Aid I love! However--needs to have a locking lid of some sort so ingredients don't squish up through the top while blending. Especially important when blending hot soup ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: deelyla

customer_reviews.title: It only takes two weeks to use it and it's broken
customer_reviews.text: It only takes two weeks to use it and it's broken,The quality of base plastic products is not good
customer_reviews.author: Yfc

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design makes it easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to clean that out last model with buttons. I love the seal nature of both the base unit and the plastic blending chamber. Don't have to remove the rubber seal at the bottom and clean the base. Just turn it over and scrub both sides, or pop in the dishwasher. Good power and easy to use, with the added bonus of the pulsing for the Ice blending feature. Reduced down to 3 stars as the blade bearing failed. Liquid can get down into the bearings and leak out the sides and if its acidic it will destroy the bearings. It is a bad design which is why they stopped selling it. Do not buy one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Blends Well for an Occasional Smoothie Drinker
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender about 3-4 times a month for smoothies, and every now and then for blending soups, and it has been holding up well. I had some trouble with the smoothies at first, but learned that the "ice" setting was what I needed to prevent air getting stuck under the blades. If you're not a die-hard smoothie addict, this blender will probably suit your needs just fine. I think the best part is that it's not huge and doesn't have a bunch of random parts that I don't need - so it's easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Reba T

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a big fan I don’t know what happened, I have been using same piece for 8 years. They changed the jar to the locking one. Sometimes employees will have trouble locking it in then runner pieces grinds against each other coating u to buy another one. Good for house use but not for heavy duty use or commercial use
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Great ice crusher! Purées very well!
customer_reviews.text: We have a family member restricted to liquids, puréed foods and crushed ice or Gatorade. We haven’t had a blender for a few years. We found that the food processor was not able to fully purée the foods to the necessary consistency and of course could not crush ice. This blender is doing and awesome job! Purées the foods perfectly. And crushes ice, a setting option, to a course Icee consistency which is perfect for our needs. So I have a happy wife. And she has reminded me of the great milkshakes I used to make with our old blender so I will be doing shakes too.
customer_reviews.author: Wes H.

customer_reviews.title: Best blender...look no farther
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast. It could be a wood chipper in another life. We use it all day for a variety of homemade items. Stores are relying on soy to substitute for eggs and milk these days. Have to return to original recipes. This blender is key to a fast and easy preparation. Easy to clean. Simple to use. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: William Teal

customer_reviews.title: Durable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought another blender before this and it started to smoke up so I did more research and decided to try this blender. This blender is great and I have no problems with it. I've used it many times and there are different speeds to use for anything. It's the perfect size too. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeyjac

customer_reviews.title: workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of buying a vitamix -- $350-- you know what i'm talking about you've seen it online, to replace this blender, since i was going to be making cashew nut sauces, and soups, not to mention the typical, smoothies and such. however, this thing has worked fine, done it all w/o complaining, and i figured i would use it if or until it burns out. however, six months daily use, and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Coz

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid Used To Be the Best Name Product
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this KitchenAid blender and have used it often. It was expensive at $85. Unfortunately it completely died in less than two years. While I understand products typically come with a one year warranty, this is a KitchenAid and you expect that product name to last. When contacting KitchenAid they offered the repair info and that I could "purchase" the repair kit and they would send a box for shipping or take it to a local repair center. Frankly, I think a replacement is in order. My $35 Ninja has lasted longer and I use this everyday. It's a shame I can't recommend KitchenAid any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Stanganelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for Salsas and Margaritas!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender! I broke my first one because I'm an idiot and didn't lock down the blender to the base to the base just chewed up the plastic on the bottom. Learelned my lesson and had to buy another one. Super easy to clean, great power for anything and relatively robust if you know how to twist a blender bottle onto a base properly. Would buy a third time if I destroy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works great for everything so far!
customer_reviews.text: After using a few terrible blenders in my life I did A LOT of research before buying a new one. This has decent reviews for the right price so I gave it a shot. Well....no complaints so far! After 6 months it has blended everything we threw at it and blends ice like a champ. Sometimes a little extra liquid needs to be added to blend drier ingredients but that hasn't been an issue. I would definitely recommend this as an affordable blender.
customer_reviews.author: thehiccupgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great blender.
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine November 17, 2015 and today its December 27, 2018 so more than 3 years and it still works great, I hope it stays this way for another ~decade or longer! 😎
customer_reviews.author: JWJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blender, but motor began to fail after ~ a week of daily use
customer_reviews.text: I liked this blender a lot: it was quiet (for a blender), solid, well built, looked nice, and the pitcher & blades locked securely to the base. I used it every day for almost a week to make smoothies and it worked well. But on the 6th day, the motor's sound and rhythm began to change and by the 7th-8th day the device had a noticeable shimmy--not a good sign. I returned it, but I will likely order another and see what happens. .
customer_reviews.author: MLS1492

customer_reviews.title: The issue for me is the difficulty dislodging the top ...
customer_reviews.text: The issue for me is the difficulty dislodging the top from the bass. I have already sprained my wrist from two consecutive days of efforts. It's a real bummer. Something has to be defective in the structuring of this blender. As a pianist who needs to have healthy wrists, this problem is even more aggravating, and distressing.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S. Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good blender for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good blender for the price. It definitely does not like breaking ice down without sufficient liquid in it though, so any thoughts of whipping up some sorbet or ice cream consistency like a Vitamix are out the window. I didn't expect it to do that anyway, I just bought it to make smoothies and margaritas and it does just fine for that purpose. I agree with other people that it is super loud, but overall it's pretty solid and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gpom

customer_reviews.title: It does what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Man I didn't know I couldn't take it apart so that makes cleaning it pretty hard. Turns out "dishwasher safe" means the blades stay in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement for earlier model
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my other similar blender because it got stuck to the base and I could not get it off. This has a different base now. It is sturdy for making my protein shakes with frozen fruits. The lid fits kind of loose where my older one it fit too tight; but it works. Has the same settings. Cleans easily. A good price.
customer_reviews.author: ElkElk

customer_reviews.title: Good blender for me
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a really good blender. It does a good job of blending my frozen fruit and yogurt for my smoothies. I find it to be easy to clean and maintain after each use.
customer_reviews.author: MazdaMan

customer_reviews.title: Liked better than Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Bought a vitamix to replace my kitchen aid blender. The multiple blades were dangerous. It was way more than I needed. My kitchen aid blenders work just fine for what I need. Blending smoothies, whipping up homemade creamer, crushing ice to make margaritas, and making homemade salsa. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SueZ

customer_reviews.title: Ice Killer
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was pleasantly surprised how effective this was. It's real easy and simple to use. I warn you, at the higher speeds, ice cubes end up disappearing. It's got that kinda power. The base is on the heavy side, so be careful when storing it. If I had one complaint (and it's minor), is you have to press it too many times. Once to turn on, once on the setting you want, once to stop the process, then again to actually turn it off. But u get used to it. So far I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kage

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BLENDER IT IS AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BLENDER. What a poorly designed product. The machine blinked a blue light and doesn't turn on. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Heffie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I had a different blender before and I always had to be cautious to not fill too much liquid at the same time (as the motor of my old blender seems to be overheating). This blender is awesome. Blends ice cubes in seconds, blends fruits to smoothies even if the entire cup is filled, cools down drinks quickly if ice cubes are added. I'm impressed, particularly for the price!
customer_reviews.author: amazon@rayo.de

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: No even one year since we got this blender and it is broke now. The bottom hélice field down!
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: excellent blender at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift. well received. Works very well. Very stable and substantial. One thing. The carafe is one single piece, Cannot be taken apart. If this is not a concern then this is a great blender. Does everything a blender should do.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last 6 months. Got it April and it’s no longer functioning already. Waste of hard earned cash.
customer_reviews.author: Adedapo  Kiladejo

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blender
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blender, except that the pitcher is plastic. I worry about how long it will last, about BPA's (perhaps it doesn't have any?) and what the dishwasher can do to it. I use it a lot and so far no issues. Very, very easy to use, and the best part about it is that it locks into place easier and better than other blenders I've used. Sometimes I'm never sure if the pitcher part is locked into place with the bottom part before I start it, but this blender is very good in that regard. It blends superbly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price so far
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Much quieter than our last two blenders. Makes great salsa, soup, frozen fruit/ice protein smoothies. Like that it has a warranty. Worth the price so far. Also love the look. I don't mind leaving it on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid blenders rock.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 10 yo Kitchenaid Margarita maker. This model kicks ass. Makes fast work of blending. Has a cool retro look. The drive connection is better engineered than our past model. Love our new countertop friend.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyh14

customer_reviews.title: was great up until this morning when the blade shattered while ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about 18 months ago, was great up until this morning when the blade shattered while making my morning smoothie. It ONLY makes smoothies, and it's not pushed hard, no frozen fruit, etc. just ice from the ice maker. Very disappointed and will not buy another KA product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Yount

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy but the motor makes too much noise
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy but the motor makes too much noise. My old Kitchen Aid blender is much more quiet. Even without the pitcher installed it sounds like a grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G.

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome but make sure to rinse or wash well after each use
customer_reviews.text: I love my blender! It's nice and expensive looking. The first of the 5 settings is quiet enough for like milk shakes or salsas. And the 5th setting is good for really blending what you put in there. Overall, I'm very pleased with my blender. I use it everyday. Heads up, make sure to rinse it well after each use. Otherwise, food can dry up and get stuck near the blades.. making it nearly impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.author: arcy

customer_reviews.title: We use ours mostly for margaritas and love the fact that the base and pitcher are one ...
customer_reviews.text: We use ours mostly for margaritas and love the fact that the base and pitcher are one piece. No more leakage on the blender, the counter, in the freezer. And the wide base means no more toppled pitchers of margaritas in the freezer. It's quieter than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: KGray

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender so far. The only complain is that it is a bit loud and that I cannot separate parts (blade and jar) for cleaning. But that's also the part I like. No leak! I usually rinse it well right after use, so the blade being attached to the jar isn't a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: HKoni

customer_reviews.title: Works well until the motor melts
customer_reviews.text: This blender worked well for 3 years—I make smoothies or milkshakes roughly twice a week. However, today the plastic around the blade that connects to the base melted during use, and the warranty for the product is just one year. I contacted KitchenAid support and they have no replacement parts, they encouraged me to check out a 3rd party parts site which sounded like way too much effort. For my next blender, I'm going to get something more durable like a Vitamix or Oster.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Conway

customer_reviews.title: A great solid blender..love this one!!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen aid is an excellent blender. I bought it to make my own Mocha Frappes that I'm addicted to and were getting quite costly buying them thru fast food places. I am so happy I went with this model, its quite..looks great (red) the ice button blends like snow quietly enough in a few seconds..all in all I'm very happy with it that my daughter and Mother are buying one as well!
customer_reviews.author: shirley jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking & Good Valued Blender
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift! My daughter loves it. Good looking, polished steel model. It does everything (and more) than she wanted. It was rated very well and had 98% of the options of the high $ popular brands. The average person only uses 75% of the options, at most, anyway. Her 1st blender lasted her 20 yrs. This should outlive that. Great Amazon Prime delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: This blender can’t properly make a smoothie based on frozen fruit
customer_reviews.text: Basing my review on the fact that this blender can’t blend frozen fruit to make a proper smoothie. It doesn’t blend properly. Better to spend more money for a proper blender that can be if actual use long term
customer_reviews.author: on1on

customer_reviews.title: Worse blender
customer_reviews.text: It’s doesn’t work well Locking and unlocking jar is treky For the money it’s not worth
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great blender but poor shipping practices
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with the blender, but the package was shipped to me in just the KitchenAid box, there was no external box. Unfortunately this was a Christmas gift and the intended recipient was the person who discovered it. Just be wary if you have a history of people stealing boxes off your door since they'll know exactly what this is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of power and cost
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you use a blender for, this has worked nicely so far. Clean look and doesn't overpower the counter.
customer_reviews.author: AGL

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Use daily. Blends frozen fruits and veggies into silky smoothness. Leaks only a tiny bit. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Helga

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. It's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it blends. It looks nice. It's easy to clean. It is moderately priced. It goes with my other KitchenAid gadgets. Cons: while it does blend, it is not at all powerful. My pina colada stayed chunky despite a good 5 minutes of pulsing and blending. It also was a little temperamental​ about when it would or would not blend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin F.

customer_reviews.title: I have used more efficient blenders. Sometimes you need ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used more efficient blenders. Sometimes you need to let it go for a little longer than you think, or stop and use "pulse" then back to setting 5 for smoother smoothies. Often find lil chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hausdorff

customer_reviews.text: I hoped this blender would blend better for the price. Doesn't work well with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Raylynn

customer_reviews.title: Horrid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Horrid worst item i spent most money on. Cannot even use. Pitcher does not disconnect. Never ever again. Customer sevice amazon so nice but turned me over to company never could hdlp me. So brand new heading fir trash moocho bucjs i waisted
customer_reviews.author: ka

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use, great blender
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars BUT the bottom gasket or whatever it is called, it’s made of plastic!!! I use my blender daily. That bottom plastic housing piece on the bottom of the blender cracked and broke after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lid not a snug fit though
customer_reviews.text: All-in-all a fine blender. Has no issues blending whatever I put in it. Only issue is that the lid does not create a snug fit on the pitcher. The lid is made of a malleable plastic that leaves minute gaps around the seal of the pitcher, especially around the spout lip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Poirson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Best blender for the price I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best blender for the price I've ever had. The blades and turn ratio take my protein shakes to whole other level. I've had it a only a month. I'm hoping it has the longevity of other KitcheAid products.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: You cannot go wrong with KitchenAid appliances
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, love it and use it daily for my protein shakes and frozen fruit. Best of all I used my points from my Amazon Visa and bought this beauty for $30. Love, Love Love Kitchen Aid and Amazon, an unbeatable combo.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Chops my ice and moves food quickly, terrific strong blender. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for smoothies but it works great and handles the dishwasher nicely. I add frozen bananas and they get mixed in without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: Stands up under heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blender for 6 months. I make 1-2 frozen fruit smoothies with a hunk of raw ginger a day, and it blends all of my ingredients perfectly. My last KitchenAid blender lasted 10+ years and I am pleased to see the quality seems consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Works great - love how you can walk away from it and it run by itself
customer_reviews.author: Shari C Millican

customer_reviews.title: Good blender, stopped working! But Awesome Customer Care!
customer_reviews.text: It just stopped working today! Finished 1 year, so no warranty I believe! 😞 Update: Called the customer care and even though the warranty was over, Elizabeth offered to replace it with a refurbished one! Awesome Customer Care KitchenAid!
customer_reviews.author: Ashwini Deshpande

customer_reviews.title: Momma approved
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas and she has been raving about it ever since. Her old blender was basically ancient at 20 years old, so she is amazed by the power of this thing. Made my mom happy, so I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: Used it for making smoothies for an elderly goat who has lost some teeth and doesn't want to eat hay. Blended senior horse feed soaked in water. At first it worked great but within a month the small plastic piece on the bottom of the blender that is supposed to lock into the gear in the base that turns the blades disintegrated and the blender can no longer be used.
customer_reviews.author: farmer E

customer_reviews.title: ... about a week now and it works SO much better than the Ninja blender I used to have
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a week now and it works SO much better than the Ninja blender I used to have. I use it for mostly fresh veggie smoothies, so I don't have any insight as to how it crushes ice. Its very good with leafy vegetables and the vortex it creates is strong enough to mix the powders that I add, leaving just a tiny bit on the side. I bought it on sale for $50 mainly as a stop gap until I was ready to purchase a Vitamix, but I won't upgrade now 'cause this KitchenAid does everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and super easy to clean. Average in the noise department
customer_reviews.author: J. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Really like that the pitcher and blades are contained in one piece with no rubber gaskets to break down and leak. Very sturdy base .
customer_reviews.author: JOE SCHUMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for first 30 days
customer_reviews.text: After much research I bought this KitchenAid blender. And I loved it for 30 days. Then the motor began to surge intermittently while blending. Besides barely blending a smoothie, it splatters the ingredients so that you can barely pour the finished drink. Either I got a lemon or this is a terribly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for value. This is it. Best Blender I've ever had. Making smoothies and Iced drinks is a dream. Minor gripes- I wish the pitcher was glass, and I wish the blades could be removed for cleaning. But all in all, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The blender damaged after few use however sent back and they refund to me. Next I'll by Oyster
customer_reviews.author: VENTURINI A.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: First ever review I am leaving for an amazon product, and it is because this thing broke after the second use. The bade got totally bent trying to blend frozen peaches. Save yourself the hassle...
customer_reviews.author: rez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the ice crushing feature, and it is AMAZING! Powerful and quick! Smoothies, margaritas, ices.....perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Christen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! This works so well, and is awesome for making iced drinks.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great product It makes great smoothies and it can be washed in the dish washer
customer_reviews.author: Shamy Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Made of metal and assembled in the USA
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great product that seems to be very heavy duty. The two things that impressed me the most was the fact that it was assembled in the USA and that the base us made of metal and feels like a good sold piece of equipment compared to my last cheapo blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this blender. I have had mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this blender. I have had mine for 26 months and tried to use it today and you could hear metal grinding. Warranty is only for 12 months for a. Item most people do not use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Holtsclaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The lid leaks a little bit but if you hold it down real tight then its ok otherwise its a great blender for the value.
customer_reviews.author: emily tope

customer_reviews.title: Big Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Used it three times, two smoothies and some hummus and it was toast! I can’t believe it! I love Kitchen Aid, but this is unacceptable! Had such high hopes for it too! It replaced an Oster from the 60’s. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Pitts

customer_reviews.title: It's KitchenAide and Awesome as always!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a kitchen Aide fan and this blender did not disappoint. Milkshakes for all instead of one at a time here we come!
customer_reviews.author: Joy F.

customer_reviews.title: $40 for a quality blender! Score!
customer_reviews.text: When I seen this for $40 I was in shock! I was skeptical. Thought it was going to be some glitch or maybe a refurbished package. Low and behold it's amazing and brand new. I just seen it in the macys catalog for almost $200. Same model. I got such a great deal! Now I see it for $88 and up on here. I'm glad I got it when I did.
customer_reviews.author: KarizzaMae

customer_reviews.title: Works great .
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Great for making smoothie with frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bader

customer_reviews.title: but found this blender to be perfect for what we needed (mostly smoothies)
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Ninja and others, but found this blender to be perfect for what we needed (mostly smoothies).
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great! It gets the job done. My only complaint is that it seems to have some trouble with ice. I constantly have to let frozen fruit thaw before blending, and it gets stuck quite a bit. But if you’re ok with occasionally having to give it a little help, then this blender is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Waters

customer_reviews.title: I love that the jar is plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love that the jar is plastic, not glass! They should put that in the description. Will be using for our RV.
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: The blade started slipping after just a week of use ...
customer_reviews.text: The blade started slipping after just a week of use. It seems to only happen if I've just washed the container though. It's happening more often now. I wouldn't recommend buying this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I make smoothies every morning. I really like this blender. My last KitchenAid was on its last leg, and had gotten very loud. I read mixed reviews before buying, but thought I would give it a chance. It is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: No need for insurance on this device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a company with a pristene reputation yet all i found were negatives. I needed a blender so bought this one, AND the insurance to go with it. Shame on me. There nothing wrong with this device. I have used it on multiple occasions using different recipes and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender for my smoothies. Quiet and fast cutting through ice. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best blender for ice. It cuts it finer than my Ninja. Great over all blender.
customer_reviews.author: mrdrake

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissappointed with this Kitchenaid appliance.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this at the end of July, moved in Oct and have just recently started using this blender regularly. It is the worst. No matter how much liquid I put in with my frozen berries and yogurt. There becomes an air pocket in the mixture above the blades. This has to be done several times during the process of blending my smoothy. I never had this trouble with my old Black and Decker!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Poole

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with this product...superior quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Langston

customer_reviews.title: Blend
customer_reviews.text: Counter clock-wise spin with a textured glass containment area and rubberized lid. We love to use it to oxidize our water in the winter and as a fan in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Moy

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy about this item, very easy to use and clean, especially size so small and light too. I use it for make juice all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Heyun

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KSB1570ER 5-Speed Blender with 56-Ounce BPA-Free Pitcher - Empire Red
product_meta.description: Color:Empire RedThe KitchenAid Classic Blender provides the ultimate blending performance to stir, chop, mix, puree and liquefy, with pulse 1-5 settings and crush ice mode. A robust motor, unique one-piece, 56-oz. BPA-Free pitcher, stainless steel blades and electronic controls combine to create a powerful motion that is fast and thorough for exceptional blending results. Additionally, Intelli-Speed Motor Control senses contents and maintains optimal speed to power through all ingredients.
feature_bullets: The Intelli-Speed Motor Control senses contents and maintains optimal speed to power through all ingredients
Stir, chop, mix, puree or liquefy. Pulse mode works with all speeds for staggered blending, while the crush ice feature pulses at precise intervals for optimal ice crushing results
The Soft Start Feature starts the motor at a slower speed to pull food into the blade then quickly increases to the selected speed setting
Steel-Reinforced Coupler provides direct, efficient power transfer from the motor directly to the blade for robust blending
The Clean-Touch Control Panel wipes clean easily
The 56-oz. BPA-Free Pitcher is shatter-, scratch- and stain-resistant and is dishwasher safe for easy cleanup
Included components: Cooks' Tools;Cream Makers & Chargers;electric-blenders

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,279 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
